creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: orange cotton ceremonial "banner"; inscription reads, "Recoerdo de Eulogio Tocay 1er Mayordomo de la Virgen Mario Rosario Octobre 7 de 1967"; four rows of multicolor facsimile of fauna and flora; green selvedge on sides
title: Ceremonial Tzute
